content:
IQueryableDataSource Interface

Definition

Exposes methods and properties that the QueryExtender control uses to communicate with data source controls.

In this Article

public interface IQueryableDataSource : System.Web.UI.IDataSource

Methods

RaiseViewChanged()

Raises the DataSourceViewChanged event by calling the stem.Web.UI.DataSourceView.OnDataSourceViewChanged* method.

public void RaiseViewChanged ();

Events

QueryCreated

Occurs when a query is created in a data source.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs> QueryCreated;
